text: Yvon Douis (16 May 1935 – 28 January 2021) was a French international footballer. He played as a striker. Douis was born in Les Andelys, France. During his career he played for Lille OSC, Le Havre AC, AS Monaco and AS Cannes. He made twenty appearances for the France national football team between 1957 and 1965. Douis died of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in France in Nice, aged 85.Disparition d'Yvon Douis, membre de l'équipe de France 1958 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in France Category:Footballers from Normandy Category:France at the 1958 FIFA World Cup Category:France at the 1960 European Nations' Cup Category:People from Eure
title: Yvon Douis
